body_html:
@memelan : A shape of None means a scalar, a shape of [None] means a one-dimensional tensor with an unknown size.

From your previous comment, it appears that this confusion has been resolved, so I'm closing the issue.
Feel free to reopen and provide details if I'm misunderstood.
Thanks!
body_text:
@memelan : A shape of None means a scalar, a shape of [None] means a one-dimensional tensor with an unknown size.
From your previous comment, it appears that this confusion has been resolved, so I'm closing the issue.
Feel free to reopen and provide details if I'm misunderstood.
Thanks!
body:
@memelan : A shape of `None` means a scalar, a shape of `[None]` means a one-dimensional tensor with an unknown size. 

From your previous comment, it appears that this confusion has been resolved, so I'm closing the issue.
Feel free to reopen and provide details if I'm misunderstood.
Thanks!
